org.bsiet.validations

Class UIValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.bsiet.validations.UIValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class UIValidator
extends java.lang.Exception
    Author:
    The Java Wizard Development Team

    The UIValidator class helps delevloper's to make validations of various data types like Strict int, float, long, double, String etc.
    In advance, we've provided data types like e-mail, 10 Mobile Number etc. That are able to throw exception if important conditions related to data-type are not satisfied.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
